setOnBehalfOf

fun setOnBehalfOf(onBehalfOf: String): PaymentIntentParameters.Builder
Content copied to clipboard

Set the Stripe account ID for which these funds are intended.

When transferDataDestination is specified, onBehalfOf must also be specified and must match the destination of the transfer.
